alert.note: Alert for Johnson and Bartlett Mesas Including Raton Pass; Upper Rio Grande Valley (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 16 at 2:36PM MDT until March 17 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM MDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Total snow accumulations between 2 and 5 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Upper Rio Grande Valley and Johnson and Bartlett Mesas Including Raton Pass. * WHEN...Until 6 AM MDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on snow packed or icy road conditions. This includes portions of I-25. The hazardous conditions could impact the Thursday evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, dial 511 or 1.800.432.4269, or visit http://nmroads.com.

area.areaDesc: Johnson and Bartlett Mesas Including Raton Pass; Upper Rio Grande Valley
